Package gate.creole.dates

This package contains a GATE PR for annotating an normalizing dates in documents.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DateNormalizer A GATE PR which attempts to normalise dates within a document against the date at which the document was written or published.
 

Package gate.creole.dates Description

This package contains a GATE PR for annotating an normalizing dates in documents. The parsing of dates is carried out by the open-source Date Parser library.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood
See Also:
The GATE User Guide
